entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 13 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 13 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 26 February 2023
